title: [Question] Is the whole semester or year gonna be filled with events like it has been these 2 weeks?
content:
I really wanna try out a few of the events, competitions and orientations, but cannot right now due to some reasons, so I wanted to know if the number and quality of these events will be the same throughout the whole sem and can try them a few weeks later also.   
Or is it just that these events happen for the first few weeks and then become super rare couple more weeks into the sem?

comments.body: you will soon realize every day u will have an event lmao
after some days these events are gonna annoy u and u will realise most of them are trash , sorry if this hurts anyone but they truly are
Ahh damn, what about the hackathons? Are most of them trash and not valuable?
Most are trash. Only a handful are good. More quantity != better quality. I've discussed this previously.
And it's all on the one Wednesday lol
